scripts.cy-run-ui-smoke-chrome: npx cypress run --browser chrome --env grepTags=@smoke --spec cypress/e2e/UI-Tests/**/*.spec.cy.js
scripts.cy-run-ui-regression-chrome: npx cypress run --browser chrome --env grepTags=@regression --spec cypress/e2e/UI-Tests/**/*.spec.cy.js
scripts.cy-run-api-smoke: npx cypress run --config-file configs/api-test.config.js --env grepTags=@smoke --spec cypress/e2e/API-Tests/*.spec.cy.js
scripts.cy-run-api-regression: npx cypress run --config-file configs/api-test.config.js --env grepTags=@regression --spec cypress/e2e/API-Tests/*.spec.cy.js
